title: News24.com | Journalist Zororo Makamba becomes Zimbabwe's first Covid-19 death
description: Prominent Zimbabwean journalist, 30-year-old Zororo Makamba, has died, becoming the country's first victim of Covid-19.
content:
Journalist Zororo Makamba has become Zimbabwe's first coronavirus death.  
According to ZBC News, Health and Child Care Minister Obediah Moyo confirmed the death of the prominent journalist, Makamba. He was 30-years-old. Makamba was the second person to test… [+1138 chars]
